China.title: China Women's Development Foundation Introduction
China.description: This project demonstrates creating a flexible website with HTML and CSS. The website                       is functional both in web and mobile sites.

India.title: Samuha
India.description: This project created an interactive map of crowd sourced police data using leaflet.                       Users can see statistics on the police data as well as filter data based on race

Ethiopia.title: Save the Children Ethiopia
Ethiopia.description: This project used angular to request data from the Spotify API. Users are able to                         search for an album, and a list of albums would show up. The user can then choose                         from the album and all of the songs in the album will show up, which could be                             sampled as well.

Indonesia.title: The Smile Foundation of Bali
Indonesia.description: This project demonstrates using Parse to store data by having users rate an item and including a short description of a review for the item.
